text: @realDonaldTrump What if George Floyd spit on one of the police officers. Common practice for prisoners used and since he had no shirt to pull over his head. What if he told police he had AIDS or COVID19 Then that is the only way I see this being acceptable force. https://t.co/2XBwpz79Bi
